bibl.title: The Prayer of the Emanations in Greek from Kellis (T. Kellis 22).
bibl.note: Registration number 31/420-D6-1/A/5=P92.472. "The number 22 was assigned by the writer. A subsequent change in the composition of the Kellis editorial team has meant that these numbers may be subject of revision." Manichaean liturgical text. Kellis, IVth c.
JENKINS R.G., The Prayer of the Emanations in Greek from Kellis (T. Kellis 22).
